title: Red

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While Red's courage allows it to ignore temporary Defense, if a protector counterattacks, Red will still die, but the attack will not fail.
Color Combinations:
- Red and Blue (3577) makes Purple (3578).
- Red and Yellow (3576) makes Orange (3579).
- Red and Black (3588) makes Burgundy (3581).
- Red and White (3587) makes Pink (3582).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Paint the Town into a rainbow!

desc:
Post 3575
Basic/None
- As a Primary color, Red can Color a player to turn them into a Color, as long as an Achromatic or other Primary Color is also selecting to Color the same player.
- Red symbolizes strength, aggression, courage, energy, and passion. Red can attack a player with a Basic Rampage attack, and ignore temporary Defense, such as from a Bodyguard.
